Tiger Shroff Height | Age | Wiki | Biography | Movie | Salary

Bolly Reporter
10 months ago

Tiger Shroff is an Indian film actor and youngest superstar of Bollywood. Furthermore, he is one of the highest-paid actors in India, and he has featured in Forbes India’s Celebrity 100 list of 2018.

Biography & Wiki

Tiger Shroff’s real name is Jai Hemant Shroff. He was born on 2 March 1990 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Therefore, his current age is 30 years. Tiger’s Zodiac is Pisces.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Tiger is the son of famous actor Jackie Shroff and producer Ayesha Dutt. His sister Krishna Shroff is three years younger than him. Above all, He is a mixture of Turkish, Bengali, Gujarati, and Belgian descent, which is Bengali and Belgian from his mother’s side, and Gujarati and Turkish from his father’s side.

Education and School, College

Tiger completed his studies from the American School of Bombay. After that, he went to Amity University, Noida to pursue his further education but couldn’t complete it.

Moreover, At the age of 4, he is in the practice of martial arts. Tiger was very fond of football and wanted to be a football player at that time, but his fate would eventually make him an actor. In addition, Tiger is a 5th-degree black belt in Taekwondo and is given by the Kukkiwon-World Taekwondo Headquarters. It is believed that he is a young icon who inspires young people to learn martial arts for self-defense.

Girls, affairs, spouse name

Tiger is currently in a serious relationship with actress and co-star Disha Patani.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

Tiger Shroff filmography

Tiger debut in Bollywood with Heropanti. He has been working in many commercially successful films such as Heropanti, Baghi, A Flying Jatt, Munna Michael Tiger in his forthcoming film Baji 2, Rambo and Dumbura. He has also done three music videos on “Zindagi Aa Ru Hoon Main”, “Chal Waha Jate Hai” and “Befikra”.

Tiger Shroff played a lead role for Baaghi which earn ₹1.3 billion (US$18 million). Furthermore, the sequel of that movie is Baaghi 2 (2018), which earned over ₹2.6 billion (US$36 million) worldwide.

Tiger is also, sharing the screen with Ananya Panday and Tara Sutaria in Punit Malhotra’s teen drama Student of the Year 2 in 2019. After that, he appeared Siddharth Anand’s action thriller War alongside Hrithik Roshan.

Awards & Recognitions

  • Life Ok Award (Best Debutant)
  • Box Office Award (Biggest Box Office for Solo Male Lead)
  • Stardust Award (Superstar of Tomorrow)
  • Big Star Entertainment (Best Debut Male)
  • Lions Club Award (Best Debut), Star Guild (Most Promising Debut Male)
  • Screen Award (Most Promising Newcomer Male)

Salary and Net Worth

Tiger Salary was ₹12 crores for his movie Baaghi 2. His Net Worth is $8 Million Dollars (Rs.53 Crores). Moreover, the Annual Income of Tiger is estimated at $1 Million.

Tiger has an SS Jaguar 100, Chevrolet Cruze car for his personal use.

Contact Address

Facts about Tiger Shroff

  • Tiger Shroff is alleged to be dating the Baaghi 2 actress Disha Patani.
  • Shraddha Kapoor is the best friend and classmate of Tiger.
  • He is an ardent fan of WWE wrestling.
  • Also, his all-time favorite movie is Enter the Dragon.
  • Tiger Shroff helped Aamir Khan to build his physique for Dhoom 3.
  • Furthermore, Tiger Shroff is the Brand Ambassador and co-owner of Bengaluru Tigers, which is owned by 8K Miles Media Group.
  • His major hobby is dancing.
  • Reportedly, Akshay Kumar admires in an interview that, Tiger is a shy and introvert person and is very secretive in nature.
